data.question: What is the chemical formula of SCOF-3(Et)?
What type of transition does SCOF-3(Et) undergo upon heating to 375 K?
At what temperature range does the thermal SCO of SCOF-3(Et) occur?
What is the effect of light irradiation on SCOF-3(Et)?
True or False: The SCO transition in SCOF-3(Et) is independent of the presence of molecular guests.
What happens to the SCO transition temperature range after desorption of ethanol in SCOF-3?
data.answer: It becomes more gradual, occurring over 70−225 K

data.question: True or False: The desolvated form of SCOF-3(Et), SCOF-3, retains its one-dimensional pore structure.
What is the symmetry change observed in SCOF-3 after desolvation?
data.answer: From primitive orthorhombic (Pccn) to body-centered tetragonal (I4/mcm)

data.question: True or False: The SCO behavior of SCOF-3 is unaffected by the removal of ethanol guests.
What is the role of bped ligands in SCOF-3(Et)?
data.answer: They bridge FeII-trans-thiocyanate centers and participate in hydrogen bonding

data.question: True or False: The SCO transition in SCOF-3(Et) can be fully reversed by cooling.
What is the maximum weight percent uptake of ethanol vapor by SCOF-3?
True or False: The SCO transition in SCOF-3 is narrower than in SCOF-3(Et).
What is the significance of the T(LIESST) value in SCOF-3(Et)?
data.answer: It indicates the temperature at which the light-induced HS state is erased

data.question: True or False: The SCO transition in SCOF-3(Et) is completely reversible upon light irradiation.
What structural feature of SCOF-3 allows for its flexibility upon desolvation?
data.answer: The dynamic interplay of intraframework and host−guest hydrogen bonding interactions

data.question: True or False: The SCO transition in SCOF-3(Et) is cooperative.
What is the effect of desolvation on the SCO transition temperature in SCOF-3 compared to SCOF-3(Et)?
data.answer: The onset of the SCO transition increases by ca. 45 K

data.question: True or False: The SCO transition in SCOF-3(Et) is less gradual than in SCOF-3.
What is the role of intraframework hydrogen bonding in SCOF-3?
data.answer: It stabilizes the framework structure upon desolvation
